adrFormatAddress: 111 W 90th St, New York, NY 10024-1285, USA

originalText.text:
Immediately after completing Basic Training with the Center for Mediation & Training, I was asked to appear for a mediation session due to a work emergency. Considering the ink hadn’t even dried on my certification, it was compelling to experience how easily I was able to draw upon the tools I learned from the amazing trainers and utilize them towards an effective outcome! I am thrilled to continue my training with the Center for Mediation & Training and complete the advanced courses available to enhance and grow my knowledge as a Divorce Mediator.  This was the easiest decision I ever made!
Saralee Miles
Long Island, New York

originalText.text: Ken was a parasite, he just makes a hard time much harder. He’s not the cause of the marriage breakdown by any means, but he did nothing to help any part of the process. He also tried to impose his own specific mechanisms for telling the children, despite being told the mechanisms are not acceptable. Plainly unethical. He has a jovial rabbi like demeanor, but he’s just there for your money. Stay away.

originalText.text: We decided to go through mediation because we didn't want to make an already difficult situation even more difficult, especially for our children.  My ex and I worked with Donna Petrucelli.  She was excellent!  She treated us both fairly and made sure to explain each step of the process.  We are very happy with the end result.  She helped us finalize all of our divorce details, including a mediation agreement that gives just the right amount of detail so my ex and I can move forward as divorced individuals who can cooperatively co-parent together.  Divorce is never easy, but having a comprehensive mediation agreement is a huge help.  I highly recommend Donna.

originalText.text: Paid in advance for services that were never delivered.  Emails kept saying that the divorce agreement was being worked on.  Finally received a first draft that was full of basic errors.  I edited and returned and waited for a final update.  It was never received. I ultimately had to do the documents myself and file all the divorce payments.  It was easier and cheaper than using Ken who was unresponsive.  I attempted to get a refund but despite trying to get in touch with them, no response was received.   Very unprofessional and can't be trusted unfortunately.

originalText.text: I have been involved with The Center's various training programs for the past two years and I have learned a tremendous amount. As I now start to see my own mediation clients, I have the support of the staff and teachers there as a resource when I need help or guidance. I've been training primarily with Ken Neumann and Donna Petrucelli who are both seasoned professionals and excellent models for successful mediators.
